dcterms:description: The IAM dataset consists of a total of 13,353 handwritten lines or 115,320 words, written by 657 writers, and for which both line and word level segmentations are available. It is typically used as the standard benchmark of comparison for either handwriting recognition or keyword spotting methods.
dcterms:title: IAM dataset

dcterms:creator: Stig Johansson
Eric Atwell
Roger Garside
Geoffrey N Leech
dcterms:description: The LOB corpus is a tagged corpus used for linguistic research, providing a representative sample of written British English.
dcterms:title: LOB corpus

dcterms:creator: W Nelson Francis
Henry Kucera
dcterms:description: The Brown corpus is a widely used corpus of American English, providing a balanced sample of written text from various genres.
dcterms:title: Brown corpus
